If I don’t forget it, I’ll ignore it.
I'm incredibly racist against Gnomes. ","ideals":"People. I’m loyal to my friends, not to any ideals, and everyone else can take a trip down the Styx for all I care. (Neutral)
Freedom. Chains are meant to be broken, as are those who would forge them. (Chaotic)","personalityTraits":"I don’t pay attention to the risks in a situation. Never tell me the odds.
The best way to get me to do something is to tell me I can’t do it."}}
